casebody.data:
Wednesday, January 25, 1989

MERIT DOCKET

88-1831. Gawloski v. Dallman. Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and Resnick, JJ., concur. H. Brown, J.,

would deny the writ of habeas corpus, but he would treat the cause as one for an action in mandamus, grant an alternative writ for the purpose of ascertaining whether respondent has complied with all applicable regulations, and set the cause for briefing.
